casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Marvin Anthony CUMMINGS. No. 14P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 19, 2006. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., for Marvin Anthony Cummings. Christopher W. Brooks, Assistant Attorney General, R. Stuart Albright, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Prior report: 174 N.C.App. 772 , 622 S.E.2d 183 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 10th day of January 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th day of December 2006."
